 Kup approached he could clearly see a large hemi-sphere of darkness 
that =
surrounded the immediate confines of the ark. As he dove into 
the area of =
the darkness his sensor locks are lost and he is forced 
to operate blindly=
!

(OOC: I posted the darkness on the last post, but you may have missed 
i=
t)

--------------------------------------------------------------------

L=
ord Jhiaxus's missiles streak through the air at the form of Tummult 
as th=
e minion spirals down from the last hit. As the missiles 
converge on him a=
 beam of energy spews out from the ball of darkness 
that was enveloping th=
e ark, striking Tummult at that same moment as 
the missiles. The minion di=
sappeared in the exlosion! 
 
Lord Elder and Grimlock are no longer able to=
 detect any sort of 
energy signature coming from Tummult, perhaps because =
of Jhiaxus' 
missiles, or perhaps that strange beam. In either case their 
=
attention might be diverted to Nightstrike and Darkfate as the two 
concent=
rate their fire power in the Ark.

----------------------------------------=

For those near the ark, if any are scanning f=
or =96 there is a definite 
Minion energy signature is coming from the insi=
de, although there is 
a sensor distortion as well, so it is difficult to l=
ocalize exactly 
where the signature is inside the sphere of darkness. 

--=
-------------------------------------------------------------------
 
The s=
weeps around Scorponok are far more wary, and do not quite fall 
for his tr=
ap. With a quick movement they back away, using their omni-
directional att=
itude thrusters to move them in ways a jet or plane 
could not move. While =
his weapons catch them with glancing strafing 
hits they still open up with=
 full cannons as the wheel around looking 
for weakness.

-----------------=
--------------------------------------------------

Decibel is hit by the f=
irepower from Hydras and she hissed in 
pain! "That's IT! You fired on me, =
Take THAT!!" as she swung around 
and opened up on Hydras, even as smoke tr=
ailed from her wounds. 

Perceptor's firepower on sweeps is partially effec=
tive as the sweeps 
back away. 

(OOC: Is Perceptor blind? I thought I had =
read that in some earlier 
post. If so what is he using to track the sweeps=
?)

Rodimus was back on his feet, facing Cyclonus, in a fighting pose. As 
Cyc=
's palms glowed with energy, ready to strike, Rodimus locked on 
his over-s=
houlder rockets.
 
> Rodimus: The difference is I don't know that part of m=
y past any 
> longer. I HAVE NO RULES!
> 
> With Cyclonus hopefully prepare=
d for a projectile attack Rodimus 
does 
> the unexpected. With the aid of =
his thrusters he comes right at 
> Cyclonus, attempting to spear tackle him=
 down.

Cyclonus nodded at Rodimus as the ex-Maximal/Autobot commander 
spo=
ke. "Rules are important, but not so much that we loose victory." 
He smile=
d as Rodimus' missile lock on to him, but then frowned as 
Rodimus launched=
 himself instead!

With a quick and roll Cyclonus moved back with the attac=
k, attempting 
to use Rodimus' own momentum against him. As Rodimus made co=
ntact 
with him, Cyclonus went down and back as he came up with a foot, 
tr=
ying flip the mech over him.
